title: E394 Yannis Pappas
itunes:title: Yannis Pappas
description:
Yannis Pappas is a stand-up comedian and host of the podcast, "Long Days". Watch his new special "Mom Love" now available on YouTube.

------------------------------------------------

Tour Dates! https://theovon.com/tour

New Merch: https://www.theovonstore.com

Podcastville mugs and prints available now at https://theovon.pixels.com
